body_html:
@wochinge can you share code of writing events to hdfs? Since I haven't use this, and I want to save my checkpoint file and events logs into hdfs directly. Now my code is like this:
hdfs_path="hdfs://*" local_path = "./" with tf.Session(graph=tf.get_default_graph()) as sess: W = tf.Variable([[1,2,3],[3,4,5]], dtype=tf.float32, name='weights') b = tf.Variable([[1,2,3]], dtype=tf.float32, name='biases') inti_op = tf.group(tf.global_variables_initializer(), tf.local_variables_initializer()) # local including FLAGS data saver = tf.train.Saver() sess.run(inti_op) summary_writer = tf.summary.FileWriter(local_path, graph_def=sess.graph_def) saver.save(sess, save_path=local_path+"save_net.ckpt")
body_text:
@wochinge can you share code of writing events to hdfs? Since I haven't use this, and I want to save my checkpoint file and events logs into hdfs directly. Now my code is like this:
hdfs_path="hdfs://*" local_path = "./" with tf.Session(graph=tf.get_default_graph()) as sess: W = tf.Variable([[1,2,3],[3,4,5]], dtype=tf.float32, name='weights') b = tf.Variable([[1,2,3]], dtype=tf.float32, name='biases') inti_op = tf.group(tf.global_variables_initializer(), tf.local_variables_initializer())  # local including FLAGS data saver = tf.train.Saver() sess.run(inti_op) summary_writer = tf.summary.FileWriter(local_path, graph_def=sess.graph_def) saver.save(sess, save_path=local_path+"save_net.ckpt")
body:
@wochinge can you share code of writing events to hdfs? Since I haven't use this, and I want to save my checkpoint file and events logs into hdfs directly. Now my code is like this:
`hdfs_path="hdfs://*"
local_path = "./"
with tf.Session(graph=tf.get_default_graph()) as sess:
    W = tf.Variable([[1,2,3],[3,4,5]], dtype=tf.float32, name='weights')
    b = tf.Variable([[1,2,3]], dtype=tf.float32, name='biases')
    inti_op = tf.group(tf.global_variables_initializer(),
                       tf.local_variables_initializer())  # local including FLAGS data
    saver = tf.train.Saver()
    sess.run(inti_op)
    summary_writer = tf.summary.FileWriter(local_path, graph_def=sess.graph_def)
    saver.save(sess, save_path=local_path+"save_net.ckpt")
`
